entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Red Deer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Deer Regional Airport 04:47 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -10.2°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.4°C
Wind: WNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
